title: Rabadons Deathcap isnt giving the extra 30% AP
body: When buying a rabadons deathcap on kennen, i looked to check how much extra ap i gained from it, and saw that it said 0, i thought this was just a minor bug, so i undo the purchase and repurchase it, still zero. I do some skills buy some different items and still have the same problem, so i ask my team, and they realize they arent receiving the extra ap from the deathcap either. Rito pls.

replies.body: Looks like this is just a tooltip bug. Deathcap's still giving the bonus AP, but the bonus listed when you mouseover its icon stays at 0.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=caJjPV4A,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-13T03:50:25.008+0000)
>
> Looks like this is just a tooltip bug. Deathcap's still giving the bonus AP, but the bonus listed when you mouseover its icon stays at 0.

I heard from a friend that Lux's passive is also not granting the proper amount of AP that it should, Meddler. I don't know whether this is true or not, but figured I'd let you know if you want to look into it. :)
Doesn't Lux's passive apply magic damage to marked targets?  I don't think it ever gave AP.

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=caJjPV4A,comment-id=000300020000,timestamp=2015-03-13T16:45:27.684+0000)

I meant the scaling of her passive. I've been told it doesn't scale with AP appropriately. That the tooltip is false on the bonus ap given.

> Looks like this is just a tooltip bug. Deathcap's still giving the bonus AP, but the bonus listed when you mouseover its icon stays at 0.

When I checked, not only did the tooltip say 0 but also the total ap given was 120, even though I had around 200  ap beforehand.

Not to hi-jack the thread, but it's a bit relevant: it seems like it's also a similar case with HP Regen and Mana Regen items: They'll tell you how much of their respective stat they give while in the store, but in your inventory, the tooltip doesn't say.

It happened to me to.

Your screenshot proves it's just a tooltip error in your case.  Look at your AP: 444.  Your items only add up to 300.  Runes and Masteries can't bring that up to 444.  Therefore, Rabadon's Deathcap had to apply the extra 30%.
Just checked this out and its legit.
I think a lot of the tooltips are bugged, Lich Bane has been giving me whacky numbers all patch.

Just did a Co-op game and I was only getting exactly 120 AP from the deathcap, no Offensive masteries, just a straight 120 AP increase with no bonus.

i.e it isn't just a tooltip error.

It doesn't always update your AP immediately.  Sometimes when I buy Rabadon's Deathcap while I'm dead, it only updates my AP by 120, but when I respawn I have the correct amount.

I just played a 1v5 bot game to amuse myself by 1-shotting enemies with Nami's Ebb & Flow.

http://i.imgur.com/MaMXgTt.png

* Zhonya's Hourglass: 120
* Mejai's Soulstealer: 20 + (20 x 8) = 180
* Seraph's Embrace:  60 + (2358 x 0.03) = 130.74
* Luden's Echo: 120
* Rabadon's Deathcap: 120
* Lich Bane: 80
* Elixir of Sorcery: 40

My equipment alone is only 790.74AP, a far cry from the 1203 in the screenshot.  There's no way that build would reach 1200AP if the Rabadon's Deathcap wasn't working.
